channel.title: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -
channel.description:
oke guys,,
i got no-ip for my ip i run my server by soucre its all good
but now i check by runelocus server status checker its offline
a time ago, i had to change my firewall to offline, and then my server wass online but now not,, how can i get my server online??
help me pleas

item.title: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -
item.dc:creator: @pure_0wnz1 pure 0wnz1
item.source: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -

item.title: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -
item.dc:creator: @kenvanbael kenvanbael
item.description:
@kenvanbael wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:3, topic:394997”][quote author=kenvanbael link=topic=492187.msg3599101#msg3599101 date=1305402430]
oke guys,

eumh

i just downloaded a client/soucre , and i want to open the server,
but i send the link ( of my client to my brother ) and he cant play it,
i think its 127.0.0.0
but where can i change that to my ip?
i searched at client.java but i don’t find anything
do you guys know where i can change it

help me fast pleas
[/quote]
for your brother to play, you must change the ip from the client. go to gui.java, and search for 127.0, then change it to your ip.[/quote]

there is no gui.java

Read full topic
item.source: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -

item.title: I can't get my server online - help me pleaas -
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“kenvanbael, post:1, topic:394997”]oke guys,

eumh

i just downloaded a client/soucre , and i want to open the server,
but i send the link ( of my client to my brother ) and he cant play it,
i think its 127.0.0.0
but where can i change that to my ip?
i searched at client.java but i don’t find anything
do you guys know where i can change it

help me fast pleas[/quote]
for your brother to play, you must change the ip from the client. go to gui.java, and search for 127.0, then change it to your ip.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Hum.

127.0.0.1

I advise you to read some Java books on how to code and such before you actually start with RSPS.

Not flaming
